filmography.title: The Last Command
filmography.role_description: A Russian revolutionary turned Hollywood director who casts his former nemesis, a fallen Czarist general, as an extra in his war movie.
filmography.plot: A former Imperial Russian general, now destitute in Hollywood, is cast as an extra in a film directed by a man he once imprisoned.

filmography.title: The Canary Murder Case
filmography.role_description: The suave, intellectual detective Philo Vance who investigates the murder of a showgirl known as 'The Canary'.
filmography.plot: Detective Philo Vance investigates the murder of a blackmailer and nightclub singer found strangled in her apartment.

filmography.title: High Pressure
filmography.role_description: A fast-talking promoter who sets up a fraudulent company to sell artificial rubber made from sewage.
filmography.plot: A con man creates a fake corporation to sell stock in a company that claims to make rubber from sewage.

filmography.title: Jewel Robbery
filmography.role_description: A charming, gentleman jewel thief in Vienna who robs a jewelry store while wooing a bored baroness.
filmography.plot: A suave jewel thief robs a Viennese jewelry shop and charms a bored baroness who witnesses the crime.

filmography.title: One Way Passage
filmography.role_description: A convicted murderer being escorted to prison who falls in love with a terminally ill woman on a ship.
filmography.plot: A terminally ill woman and a condemned murderer fall in love on an ocean liner, keeping their secrets from each other.

filmography.title: The Kennel Murder Case
filmography.role_description: The sharp-witted detective who investigates a 'locked room' mystery involving a murdered collector.
filmography.plot: Philo Vance investigates a man found dead in a room locked from the inside, uncovering a complex web of motives.
filmography.awards: Considered the Best Philo Vance Film

filmography.title: Manhattan Melodrama
filmography.role_description: A district attorney who is forced to prosecute his childhood best friend, a notorious gangster played by Clark Gable.
filmography.plot: Two childhood friends grow up on opposite sides of the law: one becomes a D.A., the other a gangster.

filmography.title: The Thin Man
filmography.role_description: A retired detective who spends his time drinking martinis and solving murders with his wealthy wife Nora and dog Asta.
filmography.plot: Retired detective Nick Charles and his wife Nora investigate the disappearance of an inventor involving a murder mystery.

filmography.title: Reckless
filmography.role_description: A sports promoter who tries to protect a Broadway star, played by Jean Harlow, from a scandal involving her wealthy husband.
filmography.plot: A musical stage star's life is ruined by scandal after her wealthy husband dies, and her old friend tries to clear her name.

filmography.title: The Great Ziegfeld
filmography.role_description: The legendary theatrical impresario who builds a showbusiness empire and produces the famous 'Ziegfeld Follies'.
filmography.plot: A biography of the famous producer Florenz Ziegfeld, tracing his rise from carnival barker to Broadway king.

filmography.title: My Man Godfrey
filmography.role_description: A 'forgotten man' living in a city dump who becomes the butler for an eccentric wealthy family and teaches them a lesson.
filmography.plot: A socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler, but he turns out to be more than he seems and turns the tables on his employers.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; National Film Registry (Inducted 1999)

filmography.title: Libeled Lady
filmography.role_description: A smooth newspaperman hired to frame an heiress in a scandal to stop a libel suit against his paper.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor hires a gigolo to compromise an heiress who is suing his paper for libel.

filmography.title: The Ex-Mrs. Bradford
filmography.role_description: A successful surgeon who is dragged into a murder investigation at a racetrack by his mystery-writer ex-wife.
filmography.plot: A surgeon is reunited with his ex-wife, a mystery novelist, and together they solve a murder case involving a jockey.

filmography.title: After the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: The dapper detective who returns home to San Francisco only to be pulled into a family murder case involving Nora's cousin.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles return to San Francisco and investigate a murder involving Nora's cousin on New Year's Eve.

filmography.title: Double Wedding
filmography.role_description: A free-spirited bohemian artist living in a trailer who clashes with a controlling businesswoman over her sister's engagement.
filmography.plot: A bohemian artist tries to loosen up a stiff, controlling dress shop owner while wooing her sister.

filmography.title: Another Thin Man
filmography.role_description: Nick Charles investigates a murder at a Long Island estate while dealing with new fatherhood.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles go to Long Island for a weekend and end up investigating the murder of their host.

filmography.title: I Love You Again
filmography.role_description: A boring businessman who gets hit on the head and remembers his past life as a suave con man, then tries to re-woo his wife.
filmography.plot: A solid citizen recovers from amnesia to discover he was once a con artist, and falls in love with his soon-to-be ex-wife.

filmography.title: Love Crazy
filmography.role_description: A husband who feigns insanity to prevent his wife from divorcing him, leading to a series of zany complications.
filmography.plot: A man pretends to be insane to stop his wife from divorcing him after a misunderstanding with an old flame.
filmography.awards: Notable Comedy Pairing with Myrna Loy

filmography.title: Shadow of the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: Nick Charles investigates a racetrack murder to clear an innocent man, juggling the case with domestic life.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles investigate a murder at a racetrack that is linked to a gambling syndicate.

filmography.title: The Thin Man Goes Home
filmography.role_description: Nick Charles visits his parents in his small hometown and gets involved in a local murder mystery.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora visit Nick's parents in Sycamore Springs, where Nick tries to impress his father by solving a murder.

filmography.title: Ziegfeld Follies
filmography.role_description: The heavenly host who introduces various musical and comedy acts in this star-studded revue film.
filmography.plot: From heaven, Florenz Ziegfeld recalls his greatest stars and introduces a series of musical and comedy numbers.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Best Musical Comedy

filmography.title: Song of the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: Nick Charles navigates the world of jazz musicians to solve a murder on a gambling ship.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora investigate the murder of a bandleader on a gambling ship, leading them into the jazz world.

filmography.title: Life with Father
filmography.role_description: A bombastic, red-headed Victorian patriarch who rules his 1880s New York household with bluster but has a soft heart.
filmography.plot: A strict but loving father runs his household in 1880s New York City, facing domestic crises and his wife's insistence on baptism.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; NYFCC: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: The Senator Was Indiscreet
filmography.role_description: A dim-witted U.S. Senator who keeps a diary of political secrets and inadvertently runs for President.
filmography.plot: A bumbling Senator decides to run for President, but his campaign is threatened when his diary of secrets goes missing.

filmography.title: Mr. Peabody and the Mermaid
filmography.role_description: A middle-aged man facing a mid-life crisis who catches a mermaid while fishing in the Caribbean.
filmography.plot: A married man on vacation catches a mermaid and falls in love with her, causing complications with his wife.

filmography.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, older Texas oilman who is pursued by a gold-digging model but proves to be a gentleman.
filmography.plot: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

filmography.title: Mister Roberts
filmography.role_description: The ship's wise and weary doctor who serves as a confidant to the title character; Powell's final film role.
filmography.plot: In the waning days of World War II, a cargo ship officer battles his tyrannical captain while trying to get a transfer to combat duty.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor (Jack Lemmon)
